Proteoformquant
  • Spectrum
  • View page source

Spectrum

class spectrum.Spectrum(spectrumID, identMzid=None, max_rank=10)
get_residuals(threshold=0)

returns the residuals, threshold if the minimum value for residuals to be taken into acount

set_ident_data_mzid(identMzid, max_rank)

fill PSM list from identification result dict from pyteomics

set_spec_data_mgf(specMgf)

add spetrum information from a pyteomics mgf object

set_spec_data_mzml(spec_mzml)

add spetrum information from a pyteomics mzml object

set_sum_intens_annot_frag()

For proteoforms in self.psms where is_validated is true, set self.sumIntensAnnotFrag as the sum of annotated peaks

update_psms_ratio(psms_rank=[], verbose=False)

compute the ratios of psms in “psms” if psms_rank is empty proteoforms that are validated (is_validated == T) are considered else the proteforms of rank in psms_rank are considered
